name: Ciri
ability:
Deploy: Damage 3 enemy units by 1.
Whenever you lose a Round, return this unit to your hand.
ability_html: Deploy: Damage 3 enemy units by 1. Whenever you lose a Round, return this unit to your hand.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: I go wherever I please, whenever I please.

name: Geralt: Igni
ability:
Deploy: Destroy the highest power units on an enemy row with a total of 40 or more power.
Initiative: Destroy the highest power units on an enemy row with a total of 25 or more power instead.
ability_html: Deploy: Destroy the highest power units on an enemy row with a total of 40 or more power. Initiative: Destroy the highest power units on an enemy row with a total of 25 or more power instead.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Initiative: Trigger this ability if you haven't used an Order, Fee or Spring ability this turn.
flavor: A twist of a witcher's fingers can light a lamp… or incinerate a foe.

name: Geralt of Rivia
ability: Deploy: Destroy an enemy unit with 9 or more power.
ability_html: Deploy: Destroy an enemy unit with 9 or more power.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: If that's what it takes to save the world, it's better to let that world die.

name: Regis
ability:
Deploy: Damage all units on an enemy row by 1.
Initiative: If any were destroyed, repeat this ability.
ability_html: Deploy: Damage all units on an enemy row by 1. Initiative: If any were destroyed, repeat this ability.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Initiative: Trigger this ability if you haven't used an Order, Fee or Spring ability this turn.
flavor: Some consider me a monster. A blood-crazed, savage monster.

name: Regis: Higher Vampire
ability: Order (Melee): Drain an enemy by the amount of boost it has.
ability_html: Order (Melee): Drain an enemy by the amount of boost it has.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Drain: Damage ignoring the target's armor, then boost self by the damage dealt.
flavor: He becomes invisible at will. His glance hypnotizes into a deep sleep. He then drinks his fill, turns into a bat and flies off. Altogether uncouth.

name: Triss Merigold
ability: Deploy (Ranged): Reveal a random unit from your deck and damage an enemy unit by its power.
ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Reveal a random unit from your deck and damage an enemy unit by its power.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Reveal: Show a card to both players, then hide it back in the hand or deck.
flavor: I can take care of myself. Trust me.

name: Villentretenmerth
ability: Timer 2: Destroy the highest-power unit on the battlefield, excluding self.
ability_html: Timer 2: Destroy the highest-power unit on the battlefield, excluding self.
keyword_html: Timer: Before the end of your turn, lower the number by 1. When the number reaches 0, trigger the ability.
flavor: Also calls himself Borkh Three Jackdaws… he's not the best at names.

name: Yennefer of Vengerberg
ability:
Deploy (Melee): Damage all other units by 2. 
Deploy (Ranged): Boost all other units by 2.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Damage all other units by 2. Deploy (Ranged): Boost all other units by 2.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: Magic is Chaos, Art and Science. It is a curse, a blessing and a progression.

name: Zoltan: Scoundrel
ability:
Deploy (Melee): Spawn and play Duda: Agitator.
Deploy (Ranged): Spawn and play Duda: Companion.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Spawn and play Duda: Agitator. Deploy (Ranged): Spawn and play Duda: Companion.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: Apologies. My exotic pet's a clever birdie, but a wee bit lewd. Paid ten thalers for the beaute.

name: Ciri: Dash
ability: Timer 4: Draw a card.
ability_html: Timer 4: Draw a card.
keyword_html: Timer: Before the end of your turn, lower the number by 1. When the number reaches 0, trigger the ability.
flavor: Know when fairy tales cease to be tales? When people start believing them.

name: Geralt: Aard
ability: Deploy (Melee): Damage 3 enemy units by 2, then move them to the Ranged row.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Damage 3 enemy units by 2, then move them to the Ranged row.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: A blast of concentrated energy that pummels everything in its path. Great for when you forget your keys.

name: Avallac'h: Sage
ability: Deploy (Ranged): Play an artifact from your deck.
ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Play an artifact from your deck.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: Amongst the free elves were a handful of Aen Saevherne, or Sages. They were an enigma, bordering on a legend.

name: Yennefer: Conjurer
ability:
Zeal.
Order: Deal 1 damage to the highest enemy unit(s). Cooldown: 1.
ability_html: Zeal. Order: Deal 1 damage to the highest enemy unit(s). Cooldown: 1.
keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
flavor: A good sorceress must know when to conjure ice… and when to conjure fire.

name: Dudu
ability: Deploy: Transform into a base copy of an enemy unit.
ability_html: Deploy: Transform into a base copy of an enemy unit.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: A mimic, among the many other names for his sort: changelings, doublings, vexlings… or dopplers.

name: Eskel
ability: Deploy (Adrenaline 4): Summon Vesemir and Lambert from your deck.
ability_html: Deploy (Adrenaline 4): Summon Vesemir and Lambert from your deck.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
flavor: I'm a simple witcher, Wolf. Don't fight dragons, don't fraternize with kings and don't sleep with sorceresses…

name: Vesemir
ability: Deploy (Adrenaline 4): Summon Eskel and Lambert from your deck.
ability_html: Deploy (Adrenaline 4): Summon Eskel and Lambert from your deck.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
flavor: If you're to be hanged, ask for water. Anything can happen before they fetch it.

name: Lambert
ability: Deploy (Adrenaline 4): Summon Eskel and Vesemir from your deck.
ability_html: Deploy (Adrenaline 4): Summon Eskel and Vesemir from your deck.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
flavor: Now that's the kind of negotiating I understand.

name: Myrgtabrakke
ability: Deploy: Damage 2 enemy units by 2.
ability_html: Deploy: Damage 2 enemy units by 2.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: Never get between a mother dragon and her young.

name: Ocvist
ability: Order: Damage all enemy units by 1.
ability_html: Order: Damage all enemy units by 1.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
flavor: The Master of Quartz Mountain, the Destroyer, Trajan's Slayer. In his free time, he likes long walks and candlelight dinners.

name: Olgierd von Everec
ability:
Order: Heal self.
Cooldown: 1.
ability_html: Order: Heal self. Cooldown: 1.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
flavor: At least you now know I don't easily lose my head.

name: Operator
ability: Deploy: Spawn and Summon a base copy of a bronze unit from your hand to this row on each player's side.
ability_html: Deploy: Spawn and Summon a base copy of a bronze unit from your hand to this row on each player's side.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
flavor: As time and space collapse before us, they expand behind us. In that way one moves forward through both.

name: Prize-Winning Cow
ability: Order: Transform into Chort.
ability_html: Order: Transform into Chort.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
flavor: Mooooo.

name: Roach
ability: Whenever you play a gold card, Summon this unit from your deck to a random allied row.
ability_html: Whenever you play a gold card, Summon this unit from your deck to a random allied row.
keyword_html: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
flavor: Geralt, we gotta have a man–to–horse talk. No offense, but your riding skills? They leave a bit to be desired, buddy.

name: Johnny
ability: Whenever you play a special card, damage a random enemy unit by 2.
ability_html: Whenever you play a special card, damage a random enemy unit by 2.
flavor: Life without savoring the sound of surreptitious shananacking is like licking snails through a cloth.

name: Sarah
ability: Whenever you play a special card, boost a random allied unit by 2.
ability_html: Whenever you play a special card, boost a random allied unit by 2.
flavor: Little Sarah wants to play!

name: Francis Bedlam
ability: Every allied turn, on turn end, boost the lowest unit in your hand by 1.
ability_html: Every allied turn, on turn end, boost the lowest unit in your hand by 1.
flavor: I might just discover I look great without ears… or hands. Apparently the King of Beggars accepts both as partial payment.

name: Cyprian Wiley
ability: Deploy: Banish a unit with power 3 or less.
ability_html: Deploy: Banish a unit with power 3 or less.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
flavor: Ever since his father died, he's become a real whoreson.

name: Iris von Everec
ability: Deploy: Give an allied unit Vitality (4).
ability_html: Deploy: Give an allied unit Vitality (4).
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
flavor: I remember so little… Yet when I think of my rose, I begin to recall what was.

name: Unicorn
ability: Deploy: Boost a unit by 3. If you control Chironex, double that amount.
ability_html: Deploy: Boost a unit by 3. If you control Chironex, double that amount.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: They say unicorns are fond of virgins. Since finding a virgin these days is as hard as finding a unicorn, no one has been able to verify the theory.

name: Chironex
ability: Deploy: Damage a unit by 3. If you control Unicorn, double that amount.
ability_html: Deploy: Damage a unit by 3. If you control Unicorn, double that amount.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: Gods, that's no unicorn! That's…! – the last words of Vilemar, a famed collector of curiosities.

name: Duda: Companion
ability:
Doomed.
Boost all units on a row by 1.
ability_html: Doomed. Boost all units on a row by 1.
keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
flavor: Knows one hundred words – eighty of them curses, the rest, connectors.

name: Duda: Agitator
ability:
Doomed.
Damage all units on a row by 1.
ability_html: Doomed. Damage all units on a row by 1.
keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
flavor: Zoltan's parrot had the extraordinary ability to irritate anyone who spent time with it. Including Zoltan.

name: Fiend
ability: Deploy: Boost all Deathwish units in your hand by 1.
ability_html: Deploy: Boost all Deathwish units in your hand by 1.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
flavor: A fiend looks a bit like a deer. An enormous, evil deer.

name: Ragh Nar Roog
ability: Spawn Cataclysm on an enemy row for 4 turns.
ability_html: Spawn Cataclysm on an enemy row for 4 turns.
keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Cataclysm: At the start of the owner's turn, split 3 damage randomly between units in this row.
flavor: In the Final Age, Hemdall will come forth to face the evil issuing from the land of Morhogg – the legions of wraiths, demons and specters of Chaos.

name: The Last Wish
ability: Look at the top 2 cards from your deck, then play one and Banish the other.
ability_html: Look at the top 2 cards from your deck, then play one and Banish the other.
keyword_html: Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
flavor: A djinn, good sirs, fulfills but three wishes. Thus freed, it flees to dimensions unknown.

name: Decoy
ability: Shuffle an allied unit on the battlefield into your deck, then play the top unit from your deck.
ability_html: Shuffle an allied unit on the battlefield into your deck, then play the top unit from your deck.
flavor: When you run out of peasants, decoys also make decent arrow fodder.

name: Merigold's Hailstorm
ability: Damage 5 enemy units by 2.
ability_html: Damage 5 enemy units by 2.
flavor: The sky dimmed of a sudden, and clouds amassed over the town. It grew fiendishly dark, and a cold gust swept in. Oh my, gasped Yennefer. We're about to make quite the mess, I think.

name: Skellige Storm
ability: Spawn Storm on an enemy row for 2 turns.
ability_html: Spawn Storm on an enemy row for 2 turns.
keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Storm: At the start of the owner's turn, damage all units on this row by 1.
flavor: This ain't no normal storm. This here's the wrath of the gods.

name: Stammelford's Tremors
ability: Damage all enemy units by 1.
ability_html: Damage all enemy units by 1.
flavor: The sorcerer Stammelford moved a mountain that obscured the view from his tower. Rumor has it he could only do so for he'd fettered a d'ao, an earth elemental.

name: Dimeritium Bomb
ability: Damage a unit by 4 and give it Veil.
ability_html: Damage a unit by 4 and give it Veil.
keyword_html: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
flavor: An important part of every Witch Hunter's kit. In one muted flash, it turns the most powerful sorcerer into pork jelly ripe for cutting.

name: Blizzard
ability:
Destroy the lowest power unit.
Initiative: Destroy all units with the lowest power.
ability_html: Destroy the lowest power unit. Initiative: Destroy all units with the lowest power.
keyword_html: Initiative: Trigger this ability if you haven't used an Order, Fee or Spring ability this turn.
flavor: Behold Tedd Deireadh, the Final Age. The world destroyed by the White Frost.

name: Commander's Horn
ability: Boost 5 adjacent units by 2.
ability_html: Boost 5 adjacent units by 2.
flavor: Plus one to morale, minus one to hearing.

name: Vaedermakar
ability:
Deploy (Melee): Increase all row effect durations by 1.
Deploy (Ranged): Decrease all row effect durations by 1.
If you control Scepter of Storms, increase or decrease durations by 3 instead.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Increase all row effect durations by 1. Deploy (Ranged): Decrease all row effect durations by 1. If you control Scepter of Storms, increase or decrease durations by 3 instead.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: The druid Vaedermakar controls the elements. He soothes storms into silence, musters destructive hail, summons lightning to turn foes into ash. So I advise you well… treat him with utmost respect.

name: Alzur's Double-Cross
ability: Play the highest unit from your deck.
ability_html: Play the highest unit from your deck.
flavor: A few of Alzur's monstrous creations roam the world still. Not least among them the horrid viy, who massacred its mage-creator and destroyed half of Maribor before fleeing into Riverdell's gloomy woodland.

name: Alzur's Thunder
ability: Damage a unit by 5.
ability_html: Damage a unit by 5.
flavor: We stand not the slightest chance of incanting a spell so complex as Alzur's Thunder. It is claimed Alzur had a voice like a hunting horn and the diction of a master orator.

name: Biting Frost
ability: Spawn Frost on an enemy row for 3 turns.
ability_html: Spawn Frost on an enemy row for 3 turns.
keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Frost: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the highest power unit in this row by 2.
flavor: Best thing about frost? Bodies of the fallen don't rot so quickly.

name: Clear Skies
ability: Boost all units in an ally row by 1.
ability_html: Boost all units in an ally row by 1.
flavor: The sun's shinin', Dromle! The sun's shinin'! Maybe there's hope after all…

name: Impenetrable Fog
ability: Spawn Fog on an enemy row for 3 turns.
ability_html: Spawn Fog on an enemy row for 3 turns.
keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Fog: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the lowest power unit in this row by 2.
flavor: A good commander's dream… and a bad one's horror.

name: Manticore Venom
ability: Damage 3 enemy units by 3.
ability_html: Damage 3 enemy units by 3.
flavor: Kills quicker than you can recite the Emperor of Nilfgaard's title in full.

name: Adrenaline Rush
ability: Boost an allied unit by 8 if there are no other units on that row.
ability_html: Boost an allied unit by 8 if there are no other units on that row.
flavor: The beast rushed at them wildly, with fury in its eyes, immune to pain and any strikes the defenders could land. Nothing stood to stop it…

name: Epidemic
ability: Destroy a 4 provision cost unit.
ability_html: Destroy a 4 provision cost unit.
flavor: Epidemics respect no persons, no borders.

name: Scorch
ability:
Destroy the highest-power unit.
Initiative: Destroy all highest-power units instead.
ability_html: Destroy the highest-power unit. Initiative: Destroy all highest-power units instead.
keyword_html: Initiative: Trigger this ability if you haven't used an Order, Fee or Spring ability this turn.
flavor: Geralt took one step back. He'd seen men hit by Scorch before. Or more accurately, seen what remained of them afterwards.

name: Swallow
ability: Boost a unit by 6.
ability_html: Boost a unit by 6.
flavor: Symbolizing spring and rejuvenation, the swallow lent its name to this potion that accelerates the rate at which wounds scab over and heal.

name: Thunderbolt
ability:
Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 3.
Order: Boost an allied unit by 3.
ability_html: Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 3. Order: Boost an allied unit by 3.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
flavor: The witcher's face changed… his mien turning inhuman, horrifying.

name: Torrential Rain
ability: Spawn Rain on an enemy row for 3 turns.
ability_html: Spawn Rain on an enemy row for 3 turns.
keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1.
flavor: Even the rain in this land smells vile.

name: An Craite Warcrier
ability: Bloodthirst 1: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
ability_html: Bloodthirst 1: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
keyword_html: Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
flavor: Every man, woman and child in Skellige can split a foe with an axe. Only a select few can split enemy ears with a rage-filled cry.

name: Bekker's Dark Mirror
ability: Choose a unit. If it's boosted, damage it by double the amount boosted. If it's damaged, boost it by double the amount damaged.
ability_html: Choose a unit. If it's boosted, damage it by double the amount boosted. If it's damaged, boost it by double the amount damaged.
flavor: Gaze long into the abyss, and the abyss will gaze back into you.

name: Renew
ability: Play a unit from your graveyard with a provision cost of 9 or less and give it Doomed.
ability_html: Play a unit from your graveyard with a provision cost of 9 or less and give it Doomed.
keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
flavor: Medicus curat, magicae sanat.

name: Dimeritium Shackles
ability: Lock a unit and damage it by 3.
ability_html: Lock a unit and damage it by 3.
keyword_html: Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
flavor: The mage's arms were twisted and bound behind his back. The Redanians gave the fetters a good shake. Terranova cried out, lurched, bent backwards, bowed forward, then retched and groaned. It was clear of what his manacles were made.

name: Mardroeme
ability: Damage a unit by 3, then boost it by 9.
ability_html: Damage a unit by 3, then boost it by 9.
flavor: Eat enough of them, and the world will never be the same…

name: Bloody Baron
ability:
Formation.
Order: Reset the power of a unit.
Inspired: If it was boosted, give it Bleeding for the duration equal to the amount of boost it lost.
ability_html: Formation. Order: Reset the power of a unit. Inspired: If it was boosted, give it Bleeding for the duration equal to the amount of boost it lost.
keyword_html: Formation: If played on the melee row, gain Zeal. If played on the ranged row, boost self by 1. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
flavor: I've not been a good father, I know, but… perhaps it's not too late.

name: Vernon Roche
ability:
Disloyal. 
Deploy: Play the top 2 cards from your deck.
ability_html: Disloyal. Deploy: Play the top 2 cards from your deck.
keyword_html: Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: A patriot… and a real pain in the rear.

name: John Natalis
ability: Deploy (Melee): Play a Warfare card from your deck.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Play a Warfare card from your deck.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
flavor: That square should bear the names of my soldiers, of the dead. Not mine.

name: Lined Pockets
ability:
Order: Gain 1 Coin. Charge: 6
Whenever you play a Crime card, gain 1 Coin.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
ability_html: Order: Gain 1 Coin. Charge: 6 Whenever you play a Crime card, gain 1 Coin. This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
flavor: Really believe you can dupe me with that tale you just pulled from your arse?

name: Shani
ability:
Zeal.
Order: Summon a bronze Human unit from your graveyard to this row and give it Doomed.
Cooldown: 7.
ability_html: Zeal. Order: Summon a bronze Human unit from your graveyard to this row and give it Doomed. Cooldown: 7.
keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
flavor: I'm a medic. I tend to know what I'm doing when I prescribe something.

name: Triss: Butterflies
ability: Deploy (Ranged): Shuffle a card from your hand into your deck, then draw a unit of your choice and boost it by 3.
ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Shuffle a card from your hand into your deck, then draw a unit of your choice and boost it by 3.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: Cap'n… our arrows, they've… they've got wings!

name: Keira Metz
ability:
Zeal.
Order: Give Vitality to adjacent units for the duration equal to their base power.
ability_html: Zeal. Order: Give Vitality to adjacent units for the duration equal to their base power.
keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
flavor: If I'm to die today, I wish to look smashing for the occasion.

name: Dandelion
ability:
Order: Boost a unit in your deck by 2.
Cooldown: 2.
Inspired: At the end of your turn, boost the top unit in your deck by 1.
ability_html: Order: Boost a unit in your deck by 2. Cooldown: 2. Inspired: At the end of your turn, boost the top unit in your deck by 1.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused. Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power.
flavor: Dandelion, you're a cynic, a lecher, a liar – and my best friend.

name: Priscilla
ability:
Zeal.
Order: Heal an allied unit by 4 and reset its Cooldown.
Inspired: Boost an allied unit by 4 and reset its Cooldown instead.
ability_html: Zeal. Order: Heal an allied unit by 4 and reset its Cooldown. Inspired: Boost an allied unit by 4 and reset its Cooldown instead.
keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused. Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power.
flavor: Picture Dandelion in a dress and you've got the general idea.

name: Thaler
ability:
Formation.

Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
flavor: The North has nothing with which it could surprise us.

ability_html: Play the lowest unit from your deck.

Resilience.

flavor: No one, not even among the higher vampires, knows exactly how old the Unseen Elder is. They only know they should never, under any circumstances, defy his will.

name: Aguara: True Form
ability: Deploy (Ranged): Create and play a special card from any faction.
ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Create and play a special card from any faction.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
flavor: Ever heard of an anterion? Think of it as the opposite of a lycanthrope: a beast which can take on human form.

name: Uma's Curse
ability: Create and play a gold unit from any faction.
ability_html: Create and play a gold unit from any faction.
keyword_html: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
flavor: I give you three solid leads, trails as fresh as morning dew, the aid of my spies and my court sorceress. Yet in my daughter's stead, you bring me this… monstrosity?

name: Aguara
ability:
Deploy (Melee): Lock a unit.
Deploy (Ranged): Remove a unit's Lock.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Lock a unit. Deploy (Ranged): Remove a unit's Lock.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: Smarten up right now, or it's off to an aguara with you!

name: Shilard Fitz-Oesterlen
ability: Deploy: Set the power of the highest unit in your opponent's hand to 1.
ability_html: Deploy: Set the power of the highest unit in your opponent's hand to 1.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: A diplomat is a man who uses many more words than necessary to express much less than he knows.

name: Adda: Striga
ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Dominance: Damage it by 4 instead.
ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. Dominance: Damage it by 4 instead.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Dominance: Trigger this ability if you control the highest unit on the battlefield.
flavor: And the striga's doin' fine. Sure, she takes a bite outta someone from time to time, but you get used to that.

name: Trial of the Grasses
ability: Set a unit's power to 12. If it's not a Witcher, damage it by 6 first.
ability_html: Set a unit's power to 12. If it's not a Witcher, damage it by 6 first.
flavor: Imagine a lump of clay. In order to shape it, you must first moisten it or it will crumble. The Trial's initial part does just that. It opens the body to change, so to speak. Only then can the mutagens produce a witcher.

name: Hanmarvyn's Blue Dream
ability: Play a unit from your opponent's graveyard with a provision cost of 9 or less and give it Doomed.
ability_html: Play a unit from your opponent's graveyard with a provision cost of 9 or less and give it Doomed.
keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
flavor: This spell lets you see the last moments of a dead man's life… if you can survive its casting.

name: Xavier Moran
ability:
Melee: Whenever you play a Dwarf, gain 1 Armor.
Barricade: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
ability_html: Melee: Whenever you play a Dwarf, gain 1 Armor. Barricade: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
keyword_html: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power. Barricade: Trigger this ability if the unit has armor.
flavor: Well? Somethin' wrong? Venison a wee bit rank for ye? Ehh, princess?

name: Heymaey Herbalist
ability: Deploy (Ranged): Heal an allied unit by 3 and boost it by 3.
ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Heal an allied unit by 3 and boost it by 3.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
flavor: We don't burn cunning women in Skellige - we take their advice.

name: Iris' Companions
ability:
Deploy: Draw a card of your choice, then Discard a random card.
If you have Iris in hand, choose which card to Discard instead.
ability_html: Deploy: Draw a card of your choice, then Discard a random card. If you have Iris in hand, choose which card to Discard instead.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Discard: Move a card from your hand to the graveyard. Note: Related abilities are not triggered when discarding manually.
flavor: We'd rather keep our names to ourselves. Think of us as… friends of the house.

name: Dorregaray of Vole
ability: Deploy: Lock a unit.
ability_html: Deploy: Lock a unit.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
flavor: Like the witchers, Dorregaray is a monster aficionado, though he's developed his own classification system. Instead of dividing them into necrophages, ogroids and the like, he just thinks they're all wonderful.

name: Hubert Rejk
ability:
Whenever you use an Order ability while this card is in your deck, remove a counter from it. When counter reaches 0, Summon this card from your deck to your Ranged row.
Counter: 10.
ability_html: Whenever you use an Order ability while this card is in your deck, remove a counter from it. When counter reaches 0, Summon this card from your deck to your Ranged row. Counter: 10.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: The coroner is a calm, peaceful person. He even treats corpses with the utmost delicacy.

name: Nivellen
ability: Deploy: Move 3 adjacent units to the other row.
ability_html: Deploy: Move 3 adjacent units to the other row.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: Lost? Well, go be lost somewhere else. Somewhere not on my property, that is. Point your left ear to the sun and keep walking, you'll hit the road soon enough. Well? What're you waiting for?

name: Stregobor
ability: Timer 2 (Ranged): Each player draws a unit and sets its power to 1.
ability_html: Timer 2 (Ranged): Each player draws a unit and sets its power to 1.
keyword_html: Timer: Before the end of your turn, lower the number by 1. When the number reaches 0, trigger the ability. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: The witcher had met thieves that looked like town councilors, town councilors that looked like beggars and kings that looked like thieves. Stregobor, though, always looked exactly like the commonly accepted imagining of what a mage should look like.

name: Vincent Meis
ability:
Zeal.
Order (Melee): Set the power of a non-boosted enemy to 1.
ability_html: Zeal. Order (Melee): Set the power of a non-boosted enemy to 1.
keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
flavor: By day, Captain of the Vizima City Guard. By night, merciless avenger and defender of the downtrodden.

name: Hym
ability: Deploy: Swap this unit's power with a damaged unit's power.
ability_html: Deploy: Swap this unit's power with a damaged unit's power.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: The gods' speak to me… I hear them whisper from the shadows…

name: Olaf
ability: Order: Boost Olaf by twice the amount he is damaged.
ability_html: Order: Boost Olaf by twice the amount he is damaged.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
flavor: 10-time winner of the venerable title of Champion of the An Skellig Arena.

name: Ulfhedinn
ability: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by half its current power.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by half its current power.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
flavor: Werewolf? Oh, no, no… this is something far, far worse.

name: Dimun Warship
ability:
Whenever you play a Pirate, damage self and a random enemy unit by 1.
Deathwish: Summon the highest-power bronze Pirate from your Graveyard to this row.
ability_html: Whenever you play a Pirate, damage self and a random enemy unit by 1. Deathwish: Summon the highest-power bronze Pirate from your Graveyard to this row.
keyword_html: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
flavor: Clan Dimun warships are light and fast, perfect for racing down slow merchant frigates.

name: Siren
ability:
Order: Consume an allied unit.
Deathwish: Boost adjacent allied units by 2.
ability_html: Order: Consume an allied unit. Deathwish: Boost adjacent allied units by 2.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
flavor: Legends claim they lure sailors to their doom with their entrancing songs… though more likely, the sailors were more entranced by their other ample charms.

name: Alpha Werewolf
ability: Immunity. Thrive.
ability_html: Immunity. Thrive.
keyword_html: Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted. Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power.
flavor: Some say lycanthropy's contagious - get bit by a werewolf, you turn into one yourself. Witchers know that's nonsense, of course - only a powerful curse can bring on this condition.

name: Assassination
ability: Damage a unit by 6. Decrease the damage by 1 for each unit adjacent to it.
ability_html: Damage a unit by 6. Decrease the damage by 1 for each unit adjacent to it.
flavor: Assassin — one of the most popular professions at the imperial court, just after scribe and courtesan.

name: Infiltrator
ability: Melee: On round end, shuffle this unit into your opponent's deck.
ability_html: Melee: On round end, shuffle this unit into your opponent's deck.
keyword_html: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
flavor: You can run, but you'll never hide.

name: Kingslayer
ability: Deploy: Reveal the top card from your opponent's deck and Banish it.
ability_html: Deploy: Reveal the top card from your opponent's deck and Banish it.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Reveal: Show a card to both players, then hide it back in the hand or deck. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
flavor: The School of the Viper shall be reborn… Letho saw to that.

name: Pyrotechnician
ability: Order: Damage a random enemy unit and self by 4.
ability_html: Order: Damage a random enemy unit and self by 4.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
flavor: An extraordinarily risky, and thus much revered, Mahakam trade. Its best-known practitioner was a dwarf by the name of Mikkel Bay.

name: Farseer
ability: Deploy: Boost an unboosted unit in your hand by the number of boosted units in your hand.
ability_html: Deploy: Boost an unboosted unit in your hand by the number of boosted units in your hand.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: Her words might seem unintelligible at times, but they always contain hidden meanings and tremendous wisdom.

name: Elven Scribe
ability:
Remove a Counter whenever you play a Special card.
Counter: 3.
When Counter reaches 0, boost self by 6.
ability_html:
Remove a Counter whenever you play a Special card.
Counter: 3.
When Counter reaches 0, boost self by 6.
flavor: Knowledge, my dear, is a privilege, and privileges are only shared among equals.

name: Panther
ability:
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Deploy (Ranged): Give an enemy unit Bleeding for 4 turns.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2. Deploy (Ranged): Give an enemy unit Bleeding for 4 turns.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
flavor: An Oxenfurt scholar once examined a panther and declared it was nothing more than a leopard of a different color. The panther seemed indifferent to this pronouncement and gobbled him up before he could complete his research.

name: Tuirseach Bearmaster
ability:
Deploy: Give an allied Beast Vitality for 3 turns.
Bonded: Boost an allied Beast by 3 instead.
ability_html: Deploy: Give an allied Beast Vitality for 3 turns. Bonded: Boost an allied Beast by 3 instead.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding. Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
flavor: Don't touch him. Don't look him in the eyes. In fact… don't go anywhere near him.

name: Dimun Corsair
ability:
Zeal. Order: Remove up to 2 Armor from an allied unit and boost self by the same amount.
Cooldown: 2.
Whenever you play a Ship, decrease Cooldown by 1.
ability_html: Zeal. Order: Remove up to 2 Armor from an allied unit and boost self by the same amount. Cooldown: 2. Whenever you play a Ship, decrease Cooldown by 1.
keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
flavor: The sea's ours, along with everythin' that floats, swims or sails in it!

name: Dimun Smuggler
ability:
Deploy: If played next to a Ship, Spawn a base copy of self on this row.
Zeal. Order: Damage a unit by 1.
ability_html: Deploy: If played next to a Ship, Spawn a base copy of self on this row. Zeal. Order: Damage a unit by 1.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
flavor: Spikeroog's a barren backwater, but that don't bother us - everythin' we need, we take from you.

name: Heymaey Flaminica
ability: At the end of your turn, Heal all other units on this row by 1.
ability_html: At the end of your turn, Heal all other units on this row by 1.
keyword_html: Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
flavor: A flaminica, the highest position among the druidesses, commands a great deal of respect and wields a great deal of power.

name: Heymaey Protector
ability: Whenever an adjacent unit takes damage, boost self by 1.
ability_html: Whenever an adjacent unit takes damage, boost self by 1.
flavor: He fears nothing save Freya's wrath... and his wife's.

name: Royal Decree
ability: Play a unit from your deck.
ability_html: Play a unit from your deck.
flavor: We, Foltest, by divine right King of Temeria, Prince of Sodden, Senior Protector of Brugge, etcetera, etcetera, do hereby decree the following…

name: Battle Trance
ability:
Order: Spawn and play Mardroeme.
Whenever you play an Alchemy card, Heal a random allied unit by 1.

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
ability_html: Order: Spawn and play Mardroeme. Whenever you play an Alchemy card, Heal a random allied unit by 1. This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
flavor: No one can replace Bran. Though they're sure to try.

name: Onslaught
ability:
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 3.
Charge: 2.
Whenever an enemy unit becomes damaged, give 1 Armor to all Pirates and Ships in your hand.

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
ability_html: Order: Damage an enemy unit by 3. Charge: 2. Whenever an enemy unit becomes damaged, give 1 Armor to all Pirates and Ships in your hand. This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
flavor: Nilfgaardians call 'im Tirth ys Muire, the Wild Boar o' the Sea. Use 'im to scare their kiddies!

name: Reckless Flurry
ability:
Order: Split 4 damage randomly between all enemy units, ignoring their Armor.
Charges: 2

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
ability_html: Order: Split 4 damage randomly between all enemy units, ignoring their Armor. Charges: 2 This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
flavor: No one knows how he got his nickname – no one's dared to ask.

name: Imprisonment
ability:
Order: Lock an enemy unit and damage it by 3. Charge: 2.

This ability adds 14 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
ability_html: Order: Lock an enemy unit and damage it by 3. Charge: 2. This ability adds 14 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
flavor: They do not call me the Patient. Take care they do not call you the Headless.

name: Imperial Formation
ability:
Order: Boost 2 allied units by 1 and swap their positions, then give 1 Armor to each targeted Soldier.
Charges: 4

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provision limit.
ability_html: Order: Boost 2 allied units by 1 and swap their positions, then give 1 Armor to each targeted Soldier. Charges: 4 This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provision limit.

This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
flavor: The summer sun reflected in the quiet waters of the Alba – that's Nilfgaard to me.

name: Tactical Decision
ability:
Order: Spawn and play Morvran Voorhis.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
ability_html: Order: Spawn and play Morvran Voorhis. This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
flavor: A sword is but one of many tools at a ruler's disposal.

name: Nature's Gift
ability:
Symbiosis.
Order: Give an allied unit Vitality (2). Charge: 3.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
ability_html: Symbiosis. Order: Give an allied unit Vitality (2). Charge: 3. This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keyword_html: Symbiosis: Whenever you play a Nature card, Spawn a Wandering Treant on a random allied row and set its power equal to number of Symbioses you control. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
flavor: To live in peace, we first must kill. This is human oppression's cruel finale.

name: Precision Strike
ability:
Order: Damage a unit by 1. Charges: 3
Once all Charges are used up, Spawn and play Brokilon Sentinel.

This ability adds 14 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
ability_html: Order: Damage a unit by 1. Charges: 3 Once all Charges are used up, Spawn and play Brokilon Sentinel. This ability adds 14 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
flavor: The dryad queen has eyes of molten silver, and a heart of cold–forged steel.

name: Guerilla Tactics
ability:
Order: Move a unit to the other row. If it's an enemy, damage it by 1; if it's an ally, boost it by 3. Charge: 3

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.

flavor: That doddery dolt? Ye cannae even tell if he's alive or stuffed!

name: Inspired Zeal
ability:
Order: Boost an allied Northern Realms unit by 2 and give it Zeal. Charge: 3

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
ability_html: Order: Boost an allied Northern Realms unit by 2 and give it Zeal. Charge: 3 This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
flavor: Don't need advisors and their schemes. I place my trust in my soldiers' blades.

name: Mobilization
ability:
Order: Spawn a base copy of an allied bronze Soldier on its row and boost both units by 3.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
ability_html: Order: Spawn a base copy of an allied bronze Soldier on its row and boost both units by 3. This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
flavor: King Henselt did not look like a thief, but, with all due respect, that's really what he was.

name: Tridam Infantry
ability: Whenever this unit receives a boost, damage a random enemy unit by 1.
ability_html: Whenever this unit receives a boost, damage a random enemy unit by 1.
flavor: Soldiers loyal to the old baron of Tridam left the city with Falibor, thus becoming renegades wanted by the law.

name: Cerys an Craite
ability:
Deploy (Melee): Spawn a Drummond Shieldmaiden in this row.
Deploy (Ranged): Spawn a Drummond Queensguard in this row.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Spawn a Drummond Shieldmaiden in this row. Deploy (Ranged): Spawn a Drummond Queensguard in this row.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: They call me Sparrowhawk. Know why? Because I eat rats like you for breakfast.

name: Saskia
ability:
Harmony.
Deploy: Spawn an Elven Deadeye, Rowdy Dwarf or Young Dryad in this row.
Gain an additional effect based on the unit you Spawned.
Elven Deadeye - Damage a random enemy unit by 2.
Rowdy Dwarf - Boost it by 3 and give it 1 Armor.
Young Dryad - Give it Vitality 3.
ability_html: Harmony. Deploy: Spawn an Elven Deadeye, Rowdy Dwarf or Young Dryad in this row. Gain an additional effect based on the unit you Spawned. Elven Deadeye - Damage a random enemy unit by 2. Rowdy Dwarf - Boost it by 3 and give it 1 Armor. Young Dryad - Give it Vitality 3.
keyword_html: Harmony: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a Scoia'tael unit, whose primary category is unique among all of your units. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
flavor: I care not for kings and their titles. In the east lives one who truly deserves a crown.

name: Skjall
ability: Berserk 5: Destroy self.
ability_html: Berserk 5: Destroy self.
keyword_html: Berserk: Trigger this ability whenever power is equal to or lower than the specified amount.
flavor: Strike his name from the Saga of Elders! No one dare grant him shelter or sustenance!

name: Jotunn
ability: Deploy (Melee): Boost self by 2 for every unit more your opponent has on the battlefield.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Boost self by 2 for every unit more your opponent has on the battlefield.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
flavor: Skellige legend claims the mighty and terrible Jotunn, King of Giants, reigned over the isles in ancient times. He was slain by Hemdall, but with his dying breath he vowed to return for Ragh nar Roog.

name: Whispess: Tribute
ability: Deploy (Ranged): Play an Organic card from your deck.
ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Play an Organic card from your deck.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: I'd be your best – and last.

name: Brewess: Ritual
ability: Deathwish: Summon 2 random bronze Deathwish units from your deck to this row.
ability_html: Deathwish: Summon 2 random bronze Deathwish units from your deck to this row.
keyword_html: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
flavor: We'll cut you up, boy. A fine broth you'll make.

name: Weavess: Incantation
ability:
Zeal. Order: Consume an allied unit.
Ranged: Whenever you play a unit with Deathwish, trigger its Deathwish ability.
ability_html: Zeal. Order: Consume an allied unit. Ranged: Whenever you play a unit with Deathwish, trigger its Deathwish ability.
keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
flavor: I sense your pain. I see your fear.

name: Mandrake
ability: Reset a unit.
ability_html: Reset a unit.
flavor: There you all stand! With wonderment awake, doubting the plan and high-discovery. Some, as if grappled by the fell mandrake, some, by the black dog's devilry.

name: Crow's Eye
ability: Purify an allied unit and boost it by 3.
ability_html: Purify an allied unit and boost it by 3.
keyword_html: Purify: Remove all statuses.
flavor: A certain famous pirate once so loved this intoxicating herb, he earned the nickname 'Crow's Eye.' The theatrical version of his legend omits this, however, to the great consternation of pirate lore sticklers.

name: Vigo's Muzzle
ability: Lock an enemy unit with 6 or less power and Seize it.
ability_html: Lock an enemy unit with 6 or less power and Seize it.
keyword_html: Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities. Seize: Move an enemy unit to the opposite row and give it Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead.
flavor: Never has there been a beast Fringilla Vigo could not tame.

name: Wolfsbane
ability: Damage all units with even power by 2, or damage all units with odd power by 2.
ability_html: Damage all units with even power by 2, or damage all units with odd power by 2.
flavor: Also known as 'the queen of poisons,' wolfsbane is used in many witcher Potions and alchemic brews.

name: Pitfall Trap
ability:
Ambush: After your opponent plays a card face-up, split damage equal to its provision cost between all enemy units.
Spring: Randomly split 6 damage between all enemy units.
ability_html: Ambush: After your opponent plays a card face-up, split damage equal to its provision cost between all enemy units. Spring: Randomly split 6 damage between all enemy units.
keyword_html: Ambush: Played face down, then flips over when the ability's condition is met. Spring: An ability triggered manually by the player only when the card is face-down. Cards with Spring are flipped over after use.
flavor: Simple, cheap and deadly efficient - no wonder it's one of the Scoia'tael's favorite traps.

name: Cockatrice
ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1 for each adjacent Beast.
ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1 for each adjacent Beast.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: Always strikes between the vertebrae, under your left kidney or straight into your aorta. That way, it only needs to strike once.

name: Poor Fucking Infantry
ability:
Deploy: Spawn Left Fucking Flank and Right Fucking Flank on both sides of this unit.
Bonded: Boost self by 3.
ability_html: Deploy: Spawn Left Fucking Flank and Right Fucking Flank on both sides of this unit. Bonded: Boost self by 3.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
flavor: I's a war veteran! Spare me a crown?

name: Lambert: Swordmaster
ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit and all its copies by 2.
ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit and all its copies by 2.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: Go teach your grandma to suck eggs.

name: Eskel: Pathfinder
ability: Melee: Every allied turn, on turn end, boost self by 1.
ability_html: Melee: Every allied turn, on turn end, boost self by 1.
keyword_html: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
flavor: Heard you panting from three miles away. Just didn't wanna give up that vantage point.

name: Vesemir: Mentor
ability:
Deploy: Boost all Witchers you control by 1.
Adrenaline 4: Also boost your Witchers in hand and deck.
ability_html: Deploy: Boost all Witchers you control by 1. Adrenaline 4: Also boost your Witchers in hand and deck.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
flavor: Killing monsters is not something to be taken lightly. Ciri must understand that if she's to become one of us.

name: Dwarven Agitator
ability:
Deploy: Give 1 Armor to 2 Dwarves in your hand.
Whenever you play a Dwarf, give it 1 Armor.
ability_html: Deploy: Give 1 Armor to 2 Dwarves in your hand. Whenever you play a Dwarf, give it 1 Armor.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
flavor: Mark me words, if ye dinnae get up off yer arses, humans're gonnae come here an' steal our wenches!

name: Standard Bearer
ability: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each boosted enemy unit.
ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each boosted enemy unit.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: You shall defend this standard if it costs you your lives! Gloir aen Ard Feainn!

name: Rotfiend
ability: Deathwish: Damage a random enemy unit by 5.
ability_html: Deathwish: Damage a random enemy unit by 5.
keyword_html: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
flavor: You'll smell them long before you see them.

name: Alba Armored Cavalry
ability: Deploy (Melee): Lock an enemy unit.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Lock an enemy unit.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
flavor: The wedge of riders thundered into the phalanx with crushing momentum. Like a dagger thrust into an exposed belly, the Alba Division swept unhindered through everything between it and the vital organs of the Temerian Infantry.

name: Temerian Drummer
ability: At the end of your turn, boost a unit to the right by 1.
ability_html: At the end of your turn, boost a unit to the right by 1.
flavor: Not the career he had in mind when he told mummy he wanted to be a musician.

name: Whale Harpooner
ability: Deploy: Move an enemy unit to the other row, then damage it by the number of units on that row.
ability_html: Deploy: Move an enemy unit to the other row, then damage it by the number of units on that row.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: Skelligers have long known that harpoons are effective against more than mere whales...

name: Naglfar
ability: Look at 2 random gold cards from your deck, then play one and place the other on top.
ability_html: Look at 2 random gold cards from your deck, then play one and place the other on top.
flavor: Waves pummel the shore, waves pushed by the prow of the spectral Naglfar. Hemdall's horn rings in the air, and Hemdall stands facing his enemies atop Bifrost, the burning rainbow. The White Frost is nigh, nigh is the time of gale and storm…

name: Chort
ability: No ability.
ability_html: No ability.
flavor: A member of the Bovine Defense Force. Semper fi!

name: Ice Troll
ability: Every allied turn, on turn end, if you control fewer units than your opponent, boost self by 1.
ability_html: Every allied turn, on turn end, if you control fewer units than your opponent, boost self by 1.
flavor: Trolls come in many varieties, with differing shapes, sizes and predilections, though always with about as much brains as a bucket of rusty nails.

name: Venendal Elite
ability: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each Tactic in your hand.
ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each Tactic in your hand.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: Ebbing is famed for its top-notch mercenaries and light cavalry.

name: Mahakam Ale
ability: Boost a unit by 5 and remove its Lock.
ability_html: Boost a unit by 5 and remove its Lock.
keyword_html: Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
flavor: Considered to be the dwarves' greatest contribution to world culture.

name: Éibhear Hattori
ability: Deploy: Create and play a Trap card from your starting deck.
ability_html: Deploy: Create and play a Trap card from your starting deck.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
flavor: Only thing that can rival his swords? His dumplings.

ability:
Deploy: Spawn 2 Cows to the right, then Spawn 2 Cows to the left of this unit.

flavor: The hero Toussaint needs, but not the one it deserves.

name: Heymaey Spearmaiden
ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2, then damage self by 2.
ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2, then damage self by 2.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.

name: Ronvid the Incessant
ability:
Deploy: Boost self by 5.
Whenever you play a Soldier, Summon this unit from your graveyard to a random allied row.
ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by 5. Whenever you play a Soldier, Summon this unit from your graveyard to a random allied row.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).

name: Tainted Ale
ability:
Zeal.
Order: Damage a unit by 2.

Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
flavor: That beer supposed to be green…?

name: Ale of the Ancestors
ability:
Zeal.
Order: Boost a unit by 3. 
Cooldown: 2.

keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
flavor: Boros, the legendary founder of Clan Fuchs, died after overindulging in this beverage - he passed out while reaching for his golden ring, which had fallen into a brook.

name: She-Troll of Vergen
ability: Melee: Whenever a unit is destroyed during your turn, boost self by 2.
ability_html: Melee: Whenever a unit is destroyed during your turn, boost self by 2.
keyword_html: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
flavor: Lover of elf and onion soup.

name: Elven Swordmaster
ability:
Order (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Cooldown: 2.
Whenever you play an Elf, decrease Cooldown by 1.
ability_html: Order (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 1. Cooldown: 2. Whenever you play an Elf, decrease Cooldown by 1.

ability:
Order: Consume an allied unit on this row.
Cooldown: 1.

Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
flavor: No man alive, no matter his brawn, no matter his skill, can parry a blow dealt by the tail of a slyzard, the pincers of a giant scorpion or the claws of a griffin.

name: Aedirnian Mauler
ability: Order (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
ability_html: Order (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.

ability:
Deploy (Melee): Reset the power of all units on a row.
Adrenaline 2: Reset the power of all units on an allied row instead.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Reset the power of all units on a row. Adrenaline 2: Reset the power of all units on an allied row instead.

flavor: He lay down next to Adda's mummified remains, drawing the Yrden Sign on the inner side of her sarcophagus' lid.

name: Mahakam Volunteers
ability: Deploy: If you control a Dwarf, Summon all copies of this unit from your deck to this row.
ability_html: Deploy: If you control a Dwarf, Summon all copies of this unit from your deck to this row.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
flavor: Hoooahhh! Hoooaahhh! Hooo! Prepare yer hineys, clowns! Soon we'll be comin' 'round! Tae kick 'em till ye've feet for frowns!

name: Harald's Pal
ability:
Doomed.
Deathwish: Damage a random enemy unit by 2.
ability_html: Doomed. Deathwish: Damage a random enemy unit by 2.
keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
flavor: Tall one's Wilmar. Wilfred's to his right. And the lad with the stutter's Wilhelm.

name: Cow
ability: Doomed.
ability_html: Doomed.
keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
flavor: In Beauclair, everything is better: the wine is sweeter, the cows are bigger and all the ladies are above average.

name: An Craite Marauder
ability: Deploy (Melee): Split 3 damage randomly between all enemy units.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Split 3 damage randomly between all enemy units.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
flavor: You daft? You mean to sail to Skellige? Those barbarians'll tear you to shreds!

name: Phoenix
ability: On round start, if Phoenix is in your graveyard, Banish it, then Spawn Phoenix Hatchling and Summon it to a random allied row.
ability_html: On round start, if Phoenix is in your graveyard, Banish it, then Spawn Phoenix Hatchling and Summon it to a random allied row.
keyword_html: Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
flavor: What came first, the chicken or the egg? Compared to the conundrum that is the phoenix, that question seems downright trivial.

name: Toussaintois Hospitality
ability:
Order: Spawn and play Buhurt.
Whenever you boost one or more enemy units during your turn, boost a random allied unit by 1.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
ability_html: Order: Spawn and play Buhurt. Whenever you boost one or more enemy units during your turn, boost a random allied unit by 1. This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game.

name: Stribog Runestone
ability: Create and play a bronze Skellige faction card.
ability_html: Create and play a bronze Skellige faction card.
keyword_html: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.

name: Zoria Runestone
ability: Create and play a bronze Northern Realms faction card.
ability_html: Create and play a bronze Northern Realms faction card.
keyword_html: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
flavor: I'm getting a palpable chill from this runestone… did I do something to hurt its feelings?

name: Dazhbog Runestone
ability: Create and play a bronze Nilfgaard faction card.
ability_html: Create and play a bronze Nilfgaard faction card.
keyword_html: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
flavor: Careful. Still hot.

name: Devana Runestone
ability: Create and play a bronze Monster faction card.
ability_html: Create and play a bronze Monster faction card.
keyword_html: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
flavor: My blades're so sharp, they can cut paper!

name: Morana Runestone
ability: Create and play a bronze Scoia'tael faction card.
ability_html: Create and play a bronze Scoia'tael faction card.
keyword_html: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
flavor: I grow faint at the very sight of it…

name: Whispering Hillock
ability: Play a Deathwish unit from your deck.
ability_html: Play a Deathwish unit from your deck.
keyword_html: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.

name: Invigorate
ability:
Order: Boost 4 units in your hand by 1.
Charges: 3.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
ability_html: Order: Boost 4 units in your hand by 1. Charges: 3. This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.

ability:
Order: Boost an allied unit by 2 and give it Shield.

Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
flavor: Eist came to Cintra to help Crach an Craite win the hand of Princess Pavetta, yet wound up winning her mother's heart for himself.

name: Bone Talisman
ability: Boost all allied units by 1.
ability_html: Boost all allied units by 1.
flavor: The simplest of objects sometimes possess the greatest power.

Thrive.

Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.

name: Werewolf
ability: Immunity.
ability_html: Immunity.
keyword_html: Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted.
flavor: Some say lycanthropy's contagious - get bit by a werewolf, you turn into one yourself. Witchers know that's nonsense, of course - only a powerful curse can bring on this condition.

name: Yennefer's Invocation
ability: Place an enemy unit at the top of your deck.
ability_html: Place an enemy unit at the top of your deck.

ability_html: Deploy: Transform into a base copy of a unit without changing power.

keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.

name: Slave Hunter
ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Increase the damage by 1 for each adjacent Soldier.
If the target is left at 1 power, Spawn a 1-power Locked copy of it to the right of self.

ability_html: Deploy: Transform an allied unit into Slave Infantry.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.

name: Slave Driver
ability: Deploy: Damage a bronze allied unit by 1, then Spawn a 1-power copy of it on this row. If it was a Soldier, Spawn and play the copy instead.
ability_html: Deploy: Damage a bronze allied unit by 1, then Spawn a 1-power copy of it on this row. If it was a Soldier, Spawn and play the copy instead.

name: Saesenthessis: Blaze

Order: Damage an enemy unit by 1.

name: Isengrim's Council

ability_html: Look at a random Dwarf, Dryad and Elf from your deck, then play one and boost it by 2.

name: Master of Disguise

keyword_html: Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.

name: Recruit

ability_html: Order: Play a bronze Soldier from your deck, then shuffle self into your deck.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.

Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit. Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
flavor: Zireael possesses a great power she cannot control. She is a danger - to herself, to others. Until she learns to control it, she should remain isolated.

name: Shupe's Day Off
ability: If your starting deck has no duplicates, send Shupe on an adventure.
ability_html: If your starting deck has no duplicates, send Shupe on an adventure.
flavor: Other trolls always considered him a bit odd - after all, who in their right mind would prefer colorful scraps of paper to rocks?

Damage an enemy unit by 2.

ability:

flavor: Humans despise dopplers so much, they feel mere execution does not suffice - so they tie any they catch to a stake, cover them in thick clay and bake them in a fire.

name: Sihil
ability:
Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Deathblow: Play a bronze card from your hand, then move Sihil back to your hand.
Initiative: Also increase the damage by 1 for the rest of the game. If the damage was 3, transform into Masterful Sihil instead.

flavor: What's written on this blade? That a curse? No. An insult.

name: Bloody Flail
ability:
Give an enemy unit Bleeding for 8 turns.
For each Soldier you control, decrease the Bleeding duration by 1 and damage that unit by 1 instead.
ability_html: Give an enemy unit Bleeding for 8 turns. For each Soldier you control, decrease the Bleeding duration by 1 and damage that unit by 1 instead.
keyword_html: Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
flavor: There are weapons banned in all the Northern Realms, for the wounds they deal are horrible beyond all imagining.

name: Bekker's Rockslide
ability: Damage a unit by 8.
ability_html: Damage a unit by 8.
flavor: All it takes is one pebble and we're all done for.

name: Glorious Hunt
ability: Destroy the unit with the highest base power.
ability_html: Destroy the unit with the highest base power.
flavor: By the gods' gonads, witcher, why'd you bring me this filth?! I want that beast's head! - that was a ploughin' figure of ploughin' speech!

name: Half-Elf Hunter
ability:
Harmony.
Deploy: Spawn an Elven Deadeye into this row.
ability_html: Harmony. Deploy: Spawn an Elven Deadeye into this row.

flavor: Hated by men, reviled by elves and always picked last during schoolyard games. No wonder half-elves tend to have a chip on their shoulder.

name: Dragon's Dream
ability: Spawn Dragon's Dream on an enemy row for 3 turns.
ability_html: Spawn Dragon's Dream on an enemy row for 3 turns.

flavor: In Zerrikania, dragon worship dominates every aspect of daily life. Thus it comes as no surprise they name weapons in their honor.

name: Elven Scout
ability: Whenever an allied Trap is triggered, boost self by 2.
ability_html: Whenever an allied Trap is triggered, boost self by 2.
flavor: They say elves leave no tracks in the snow, but if you ask me, they are just a pack of village idiots, babbling nonsense.

name: Garrison

Resilience.

ability: Deploy (Ranged): Damage self by 3, then move a card from your deck to your graveyard.

ability: Damage an enemy unit by 4 and move it to the other row.
ability_html: Damage an enemy unit by 4 and move it to the other row.
