flavor: Seltkirk shattered Vandergrift's sword during a knights' tourney in Ard Carraigh. Afterwards Vandergrift, enraged at his weapon's failure, ordered a new one forged, this time with powerful runestones enchanted into it.

name: Sabrina's Inferno
ability: Damage each non-Specter unit by 1. If any were destroyed, repeat this ability once.
ability_html: Damage each non-Specter unit by 1. If any were destroyed, repeat this ability once.

name: Yennefer: Divination
ability: Deploy (Ranged): Reveal a random unit from your deck, then boost an allied unit by its power.
ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Reveal a random unit from your deck, then boost an allied unit by its power.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Reveal: Show a card to both players, then hide it back in the hand or deck.
flavor: Yes, I have seen the future. And you're not in it.

name: Imlerith
ability: Deploy (Melee): Draw a card, then Discard a card. If the Discarded card was a unit, boost self by its power.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Draw a card, then Discard a card. If the Discarded card was a unit, boost self by its power.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Discard: Move a card from your hand to the graveyard. Note: Related abilities are not triggered when discarding manually.
flavor: The sisters said you would come. They saw you arrive in the water's surface.

name: Ihuarraquax
ability:
Deploy (Melee): Each player Summons the highest-provision unit from their deck to their Melee row.
Deploy (Ranged): Each player Summons the lowest-provision unit from their deck to their Ranged row.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Each player Summons the highest-provision unit from their deck to their Melee row. Deploy (Ranged): Each player Summons the lowest-provision unit from their deck to their Ranged row.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: Inconceivable. Impossible, Ciri thought, returning to her senses. Unicorns don't exist, not any more, not in this world. Unicorns are extinct.

name: Gimpy Gerwin
ability: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 3 and all copies of it by 1.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 3 and all copies of it by 1.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
flavor: Keep the vermin on a short leash. And don't be afraid to use that whip!

name: Elf and Onion Soup
ability: Destroy 2 allied units of the same border color, then Create and play a unit of the same color from your faction or neutrals.
ability_html: Destroy 2 allied units of the same border color, then Create and play a unit of the same color from your faction or neutrals.
keyword_html: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
flavor: Garnish each serving with grated cheese. Add eyeballs to taste. Serve hot.

name: Ivo of Belhaven
ability:
Order (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Cooldown: 2.
Whenever you play a Witcher, decrease Cooldown by 1.
ability_html: Order (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2. Cooldown: 2. Whenever you play a Witcher, decrease Cooldown by 1.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
flavor: It's not reason I'm devoid of, just emotion.

name: Eyck of Denesle
ability:
Deploy: If you have a Dragon in your hand, gain Zeal.
Order: Destroy an enemy unit with 9 or more power.
ability_html: Deploy: If you have a Dragon in your hand, gain Zeal. Order: Destroy an enemy unit with 9 or more power.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
flavor: The Good Book says the world is a garden which the gods once conferred upon man. And we men have this garden neglected!

name: Gascon
ability: Deploy (Melee): Boost self by a random amount between 0 and 11.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Boost self by a random amount between 0 and 11.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
flavor: Th' Strays of Spalla – 'tis you who lead them? 'Tis you they call the Duke of Dogs?

name: Prince Villem
ability:
Disloyal.
Deploy: Play a random gold card from your deck.
ability_html: Disloyal. Deploy: Play a random gold card from your deck.
keyword_html: Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: The boy's not fit to wear the crown. Hasn't sufficient wit nor valor. I know this, you know this… just, he knows it not.

name: Count Caldwell
ability: At the end of your turn, move this unit to the row with the highest power unit on the battlefield, excluding self. If it changed sides, gain Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead.
ability_html: At the end of your turn, move this unit to the row with the highest power unit on the battlefield, excluding self. If it changed sides, gain Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead.
keyword_html: Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
flavor: Your Majesty… For the queen to question commoners, why, it's simply not proper…

name: Xavier Lemmens
ability:
Zeal.
Order (Melee): Banish a card from opponent's graveyard.
Order (Ranged): Banish a card from your graveyard.
Cooldown: 1
ability_html: Zeal. Order (Melee): Banish a card from opponent's graveyard. Order (Ranged): Banish a card from your graveyard. Cooldown: 1
keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
flavor: Your engineer's got a pate like stewed meat, but he kens his trade, that's for certain.

name: Keltullis
ability: Melee: Every allied turn, on turn end, destroy the lowest unit on the side with the most units.
ability_html: Melee: Every allied turn, on turn end, destroy the lowest unit on the side with the most units.
keyword_html: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
flavor: When she took roost here, they fought 'er for near a century. Then the dragon got weary o' fightin' and they realized she weren't goin' nowheres, so… they cut a deal. She dinnae bother 'em, they give 'er what she needs.

name: Frightener: Awakened
ability: Immunity.
ability_html: Immunity.
keyword_html: Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted.
flavor: ”What have I done?” the mage cried out, frightened of his own creation.

name: Glustyworp
ability: Deploy: Destroy all units with 1 power. For each unit destroyed, boost self by 2.
ability_html: Deploy: Destroy all units with 1 power. For each unit destroyed, boost self by 2.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: The swamp underfoot suddenly exploded with a powerful splash. Two long, mantis-like forelimbs bristling with spikes shot out from the murk. The monstrous, green hooks seized an unlucky footman, dragging him beneath the water's surface.

name: Gabor Zigrin
ability:
Deploy (Melee): Gain Resilience.
Deploy (Ranged): Gain Immunity.
Whenever you play a Dwarf, boost self by 1.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Gain Resilience. Deploy (Ranged): Gain Immunity. Whenever you play a Dwarf, boost self by 1.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted.
flavor: Brouver Hoog wanted to kick him out of Mahakam once for having a llama in his living room… it's a long story.

name: Barnabas Beckenbauer
ability: Deploy: Boost an allied Elf, Dwarf, and Dryad unit by 3.
ability_html: Deploy: Boost an allied Elf, Dwarf, and Dryad unit by 3.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: Arrived here with his peddler's wagon full o' tricks an' gadgets. Went from house tae house, praised his rubbish tae the high heavens. An' what's it he sold us? Bombs that go off in yer hand! Beard-growth formula that makes yer hair catch fire!

name: Isbel of Hagge
ability: Order: (Ranged): If your opponent's hand is not full, look at the top card from both decks. Keep one and give the other to your opponent.
ability_html: Order: (Ranged): If your opponent's hand is not full, look at the top card from both decks. Keep one and give the other to your opponent.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: I promised I would never again use magic to harm others.

name: Lippy Gudmund
ability: Deploy (Ranged): Swap your graveyard with your deck.
ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Swap your graveyard with your deck.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: The coast's picked clean since long! So we set our longships up the Yaruga – for gold and glory!

name: Dagur Two Blades
ability: Melee: Whenever an enemy takes damage, boost self by 1.
ability_html: Melee: Whenever an enemy takes damage, boost self by 1.
keyword_html: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
flavor: Shields are for flower-pickin' saps.

name: Traheaern var Vdyffir
ability: Deploy: Look at the top 3 cards in your opponent's deck and move 1 to their graveyard.
ability_html: Deploy: Look at the top 3 cards in your opponent's deck and move 1 to their graveyard.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: The Nilfgaardians proceeded in the queen's very direction without a sign of panic. The man leading the Nilfgaardians was clad in rich robes. He exuded pride... and the scent of musk.

name: Reynard Odo
ability:
Whenever you play a unit, boost it by 1.
Grace 12, Order: Boost all boosted allied units by 1.
ability_html: Whenever you play a unit, boost it by 1. Grace 12, Order: Boost all boosted allied units by 1.
keyword_html: Grace: The first time this unit's power is equal to or higher than the specified amount, trigger the ability. If the condition is already met when it enters the battlefield, trigger it immediately. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
flavor: Under your husband I served ten years, under you another eight. And never in that time did I fight for a more worthy cause.

name: Black Rayla
ability:
Order (Melee): Damage a unit by 1.
Inspired: Damage a unit by 2 instead.
Cooldown: 1.
ability_html: Order (Melee): Damage a unit by 1. Inspired: Damage a unit by 2 instead. Cooldown: 1.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
flavor: Exceptions are a clear road to human blood spilt. All Scoia'tael must die. Leave the gods to sort the wheat from the chaff.

name: Phoenix Hatchling
ability:
Doomed. Zeal.
Order: Transform into Phoenix.
ability_html: Doomed. Zeal. Order: Transform into Phoenix.
keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
flavor: What came first, the chicken or the egg? Compared to the conundrum that is the phoenix, that question seems downright trivial.

name: Deadeye Ambush
ability:
Order: Spawn an Elven Deadeye in an allied row.
Charge: 3

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
ability_html: Order: Spawn an Elven Deadeye in an allied row. Charge: 3 This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
flavor: The king once dispatched an envoy to Eldain… despite my advice to the contrary. Found the envoy the next day, eyes gouged out, shaft of his white flag jammed down his throat.

name: Royal Inspiration
ability:
Order: Boost an allied unit by 5.
If it triggered an allied unit's Grace ability, refresh the Order and reduce the boost by 1.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
ability_html: Order: Boost an allied unit by 5. If it triggered an allied unit's Grace ability, refresh the Order and reduce the boost by 1. This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.

Grace: The first time this unit's power is equal to or higher than the specified amount, trigger the ability. If the condition is already met when it enters the battlefield, trigger it immediately.
flavor: We're at war, when rulers don't strive nor choose. When rulers grasp sword and shield and ride out to defend their subjects.

name: Fruits of Ysgith
ability:
Order: Spawn a Gernichora's Fruit on an allied row. 
At the start of your turn, reset this ability if you do not control any Fruits.

This ability adds 12 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.

keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
flavor: Frescoes on the tomb walls depicted Angren's swamps and the beasts that prowled them. Two words were inscribed over the largest of the horrors: Gvaern Ichaer – the Bloody Mistress.

name: Enslave
ability:
Order: Seize an enemy unit with 3 power or less. 
This value is raised by 1 for every 4 Tactic cards in your starting deck.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
ability_html: Order: Seize an enemy unit with 3 power or less. This value is raised by 1 for every 4 Tactic cards in your starting deck. This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.

flavor: In my home, in the civilized world, a general commands his force. He does not rush and thrash about like some rabid hound.

name: Patricidal Fury
ability:
Order: Spawn a Deafening Siren on an enemy row and damage it by 1.
Charges: 3
Once all Charges are used up, Spawn and play Arnjolf the Patricide.

ability_html: Order: Spawn a Deafening Siren on an enemy row and damage it by 1. Charges: 3 Once all Charges are used up, Spawn and play Arnjolf the Patricide. This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.

flavor: We're after killin'. Nilfgaardians, Lyrians... 's all the same to us. Strife an' blood an' guts to wash away our shame.

name: Strays of Spalla
ability: Deploy: Move a unit to the other row.
ability_html: Deploy: Move a unit to the other row.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: Awoo, awoo, awooooo!

name: Bomb Heaver
ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1.
If you have a Bomb in your hand, damage it by 3 instead.
ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. If you have a Bomb in your hand, damage it by 3 instead.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: Knew a young couple once—got separated right after the weddin'. Bomb in the carriage'll do that.

name: Tactical Advantage
ability: Order: Boost an allied unit by 5.
ability_html: Order: Boost an allied unit by 5.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
flavor: Remember, cadets! He who first draws his blade has the advantage over his foe!

name: Stockpile
ability:
Order: Spawn a Volunteer on an allied row, then reduce the Cooldown of Northern Realms units in that row by 1.
Charge: 3

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.

Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
flavor: My king enjoys life... enjoys pleasures and indulges often. But none of this has hindered his ability to govern the realm bloody well.

name: Angoulême
ability: Deploy: Spawn and play a random artifact from your opponent's starting deck.
ability_html: Deploy: Spawn and play a random artifact from your opponent's starting deck.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
flavor: Don't matter if it crawls, slithers, climbs—you name it, I've eaten it. As for things that fly... I once ate a kite just 'cause it had flour stuck to it.

name: Vysogota of Corvo
ability:
Zeal.
Order (Ranged): Boost a unit by 1. 
Charge: 1.
Gain 1 Charge whenever either player plays a card.
ability_html: Zeal. Order (Ranged): Boost a unit by 1. Charge: 1. Gain 1 Charge whenever either player plays a card.
keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
flavor: It's been near half a century since I last practiced medicine. The years haven't been kind to my memory... Nor the dexterity of my fingers.

name: Falibor
ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 3.
Deathblow: Repeat the Deploy ability and decrease the damage by 1.
ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 3. Deathblow: Repeat the Deploy ability and decrease the damage by 1.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
flavor: From afar, he looks like a bear. From up close, well... A larger bear.

name: Anna Strenger
ability:
Every allied turn, on turn end, boost the unit to the right by 1.
Inspired: Boost adjacent units by 1 instead.
ability_html: Every allied turn, on turn end, boost the unit to the right by 1. Inspired: Boost adjacent units by 1 instead.
keyword_html: Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power.
flavor: Anna hated her husband so much that she was ready to do anything in order to be free of the man — and the child he had put inside her.

name: Lyrian Cavalry
ability: Whenever you play a unit with Orders, boost self by 1.
ability_html: Whenever you play a unit with Orders, boost self by 1.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
flavor: A horseman's worth no less than his steed. And Lyrian horses are among the Continent's best.

name: Rivian Pikeman
ability:
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Deathblow: Reduce Cooldown of all units in this row by 1.

ability_html: Order: Damage an enemy unit by 2. Deathblow: Reduce Cooldown of all units in this row by 1. Inspired: Always trigger Deathblow.

Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power.
flavor: Get off your high horse and face me!

name: Lyrian Arbalest
ability:
Order: Damage a unit by 1. 
Charge: 1.
Gain 1 Charge whenever you play a card with Orders.
ability_html: Order: Damage a unit by 1. Charge: 1. Gain 1 Charge whenever you play a card with Orders.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
flavor: I can find the bull's-eye from a hundred paces! Perhaps not with my first shot, mind you...

name: Lyrian Landsknecht
ability:
Formation.

Inspired: Damage it by 3 instead.
ability_html: Formation. Order: Damage a unit by 1. Inspired: Damage it by 3 instead.

Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power.
flavor: Best not laugh at their silly-arse hats. Believe me.

ability: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each boosted unit on this row.
ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each boosted unit on this row.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.

name: Deafening Siren
ability: Doomed.
ability_html: Doomed.
keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
flavor: Easy, mates! Sirens never attack when... Huh? What d'yous mean Right above me?

name: Arnjolf the Patricide
ability:
Doomed.
Deploy: Spawn a Deafening Siren on the opposite row and damage it by 1.
ability_html: Doomed. Deploy: Spawn a Deafening Siren on the opposite row and damage it by 1.
keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
flavor: Only death can cleanse me o' shame.

name: Gernichora's Fruit
ability:
Doomed.
Thrive.
ability_html: Doomed. Thrive.

flavor: Gernichora's a little like a vampire, they're kindred creatures. 'Cept instead of feasting on the blood of others, she feeds them her own.

name: Elven Deadeye
ability: Doomed.
ability_html: Doomed.
keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
flavor: One, two, come into view; Three, four, hide 'hind the door; Five, six, this'll be quick; Seven, eight, come meet your fate!

Gather spirits for this wake,
A passing soul ne'er forsake,
Hear my call, my humble plea,
Unbind his chains, set him free.

flavor: “Needless to say, the ill fame of their deeds hangs like a dark cloud over our reputation to this day.” ⁠— Vesemir

name: Cat Witcher Adept
ability:
Deploy (Melee): Give an enemy unit Bleeding with duration equal to the number of units on that unit's row.
Deploy (Ranged): Give an allied unit Vitality with duration equal to the number of units on that unit's row.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Give an enemy unit Bleeding with duration equal to the number of units on that unit's row. Deploy (Ranged): Give an allied unit Vitality with duration equal to the number of units on that unit's row.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
flavor: Cat students hone their balance by walking a tightrope blindfolded. Failure is easy to shrug off at first, but throughout their training, the walk gets higher⁠—and more perilous⁠—as they work toward their final Trial, where failure is not so forgiving.

name: Making a Bomb
ability: Move an enemy unit to the other row, give it Bleeding (4). If it's the only unit on that row, damage it by 4 instead.

keyword_html: Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
flavor: You’ll probably want to follow the instructions…

flavor: “A witcher’s job is to kill monsters and collect coin. No more, no less.” ⁠— Arnaghad

Red -  Damage an enemy unit by 4.
Blue -  Poison an allied unit and gain 5 Coins.
Green - Boost an allied unit by 4 and give it Veil.
If you control at least 2 Salamandra units, choose an additional mutagen.
ability_html: Choose a mutagen: Red - Damage an enemy unit by 4. Blue - Poison an allied unit and gain 5 Coins. Green - Boost an allied unit by 4 and give it Veil. If you control at least 2 Salamandra units, choose an additional mutagen.
keyword_html: Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it. Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round. Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
flavor: Like organ harvesting—but far more lucrative.

name: Hybrid
ability:
Deploy (Melee): If a unit was destroyed during this turn, boost self by 5.
Deploy (Ranged): Consume an allied unit.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): If a unit was destroyed during this turn, boost self by 5. Deploy (Ranged): Consume an allied unit.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead.
flavor: When one head just isn’t enough.

name: Saber-Tooth Tiger: Stealth
ability: At the start of your turn, damage all enemy units that are alone on their row by 2 and transform self into Saber-Tooth Tiger.
ability_html: At the start of your turn, damage all enemy units that are alone on their row by 2 and transform self into Saber-Tooth Tiger.
flavor: The prized possession of a royal menagerie, until a commando of Scoia'tael assaulted the exhibition, released the beast, and set it upon its cruel masters. Since that day, it has acquired a selective taste for human flesh.

name: Madoc
ability:
Whenever you play a Bomb card, Summon this card from your deck or graveyard to random allied row.
Order: Spawn Cataclysm for 1 turn on the opposite row, then destroy self.
ability_html: Whenever you play a Bomb card, Summon this card from your deck or graveyard to random allied row. Order: Spawn Cataclysm for 1 turn on the opposite row, then destroy self.
keyword_html: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Cataclysm: At the start of the owner's turn, split 3 damage randomly between units in this row.
flavor: In a flash, Madoc pulled out a leathery orb with a fuse, ignited it with a snap of his fingers, and tossed it at the feet of the caterwauling behemoth.

name: Anna Henrietta
ability: Deploy (Ranged): Replace your leader ability with a base copy of your opponent's leader ability.
ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Replace your leader ability with a base copy of your opponent's leader ability.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: As head of state, I must judge her fairly. But she is my sister, thus my heart bleeds for her…

name: Emhyr var Emreis
ability:
Deploy: Play a bronze Soldier or Aristocrat from your hand, then draw a card.
Whenever your opponent plays a unit, give it Spying.
Order: Seize a 1-power enemy unit with Spying.
Devotion: At the end of your turn, refresh this card's Order.
ability_html: Deploy: Play a bronze Soldier or Aristocrat from your hand, then draw a card. Whenever your opponent plays a unit, give it Spying. Order: Seize a 1-power enemy unit with Spying. Devotion: At the end of your turn, refresh this card's Order.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Seize: Move an enemy unit to the opposite row and give it Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead. Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
flavor: They do not call me the Patient. Take care they do not call you the Headless.

name: Crach an Craite
ability:
Deploy: Give 2 Armor to 3 Pirates or Ships in your hand.
Order: Damage a unit by 1.
Cooldown: 2
Whenever you play a Pirate or Ship next to Crach, it Clashes with the lowest-power enemy unit.
ability_html: Deploy: Give 2 Armor to 3 Pirates or Ships in your hand. Order: Damage a unit by 1. Cooldown: 2 Whenever you play a Pirate or Ship next to Crach, it Clashes with the lowest-power enemy unit.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused. Clash: Units simultanously damage each other by their power.
flavor: Nilfgaardians call 'im Tirth ys Muire, the Wild Boar o' the Sea. Use 'im to scare their kiddies!

name: Eist Tuirseach
ability:
Veteran.
Deploy, Bloodthirst 3: Draw a card, then Discard a card.
Whenever you Discard a Skellige unit during your turn, Summon it from your graveyard to this row.
Counter: 2.
Devotion: Also works whenever a Skellige unit enters your graveyard during your turn.
ability_html: Veteran. Deploy, Bloodthirst 3: Draw a card, then Discard a card. Whenever you Discard a Skellige unit during your turn, Summon it from your graveyard to this row. Counter: 2. Devotion: Also works whenever a Skellige unit enters your graveyard during your turn.
keyword_html: Veteran: At the start of the second and third round, increase the base power of this unit by 1. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability. Discard: Move a card from your hand to the graveyard. Note: Related abilities are not triggered when discarding manually. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
flavor: Eist came to Cintra to help Crach an Craite win the hand of Princess Pavetta, yet wound up winning her mother's heart for himself.

name: Brouver Hoog
ability:
Deploy: Gain 1 Armor for each Dwarf in your hand.
Barricade: At the end of your turn, boost all Dwarves with Armor on this row by 1, then lose 1 Armor.
ability_html: Deploy: Gain 1 Armor for each Dwarf in your hand. Barricade: At the end of your turn, boost all Dwarves with Armor on this row by 1, then lose 1 Armor.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power. Barricade: Trigger this ability if the unit has armor.
flavor: That doddery dolt? Ye cannae even tell if he's alive or stuffed!

name: Eldain
ability:
Deploy: Transform all your face-up Traps into Elven Deadeyes.
Devotion: Also transform your other artifacts.
ability_html: Deploy: Transform all your face-up Traps into Elven Deadeyes. Devotion: Also transform your other artifacts.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
flavor: The king once dispatched an envoy to Eldain… despite my advice to the contrary. Found the envoy the next day, eyes gouged out, shaft of his white flag jammed down his throat.

name: King Foltest
ability:
The first time a bronze non-Neutral unit on your side of the battlefield is boosted each turn, Spawn a base copy of it at the bottom of your deck.
Devotion: Also boost the Spawned copy by 1.
At the end of your turn, boost a unit to the right by 1.
ability_html: The first time a bronze non-Neutral unit on your side of the battlefield is boosted each turn, Spawn a base copy of it at the bottom of your deck. Devotion: Also boost the Spawned copy by 1. At the end of your turn, boost a unit to the right by 1.
keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
flavor: Don't need advisors and their schemes. I place my trust in my soldiers' blades.

name: Queen Meve
ability:
Timer 3 (Inspired): Boost all allied units by 1 and reset the Timer.
Whenever this unit receives a boost, gain 1 Armor.
ability_html: Timer 3 (Inspired): Boost all allied units by 1 and reset the Timer. Whenever this unit receives a boost, gain 1 Armor.
keyword_html: Timer: Before the end of your turn, lower the number by 1. When the number reaches 0, trigger the ability. Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
flavor: We're at war, when rulers don't strive nor choose. When rulers grasp sword and shield and ride out to defend their subjects.

name: Dettlaff van der Eretein
ability:
Deploy: Spawn Blood Moon on an enemy row for 2 turns. Increase the duration by 1 for every adjacent Vampire.
Order: Damage an enemy unit with Bleeding by 1.
Deathblow: Spawn an Ekimmara on this row.
Cooldown: 1
ability_html: Deploy: Spawn Blood Moon on an enemy row for 2 turns. Increase the duration by 1 for every adjacent Vampire. Order: Damage an enemy unit with Bleeding by 1. Deathblow: Spawn an Ekimmara on this row. Cooldown: 1
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Blood Moon: At the start of the owner's turn, give a random unit in this row Bleeding (2). If the unit is already Bleeding, damage it by 2 instead. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor. Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
flavor: He did not love like a man, but like an animal. Madly, deeply, unconditionally. Wildly.

name: Unseen Elder
ability:
Deploy: Give Bleeding (4) to an enemy unit.
At the end of your turn, give Bleeding (2) to a random enemy unit without Bleeding.
Devotion: Bleeding on enemy units also triggers at the end of your turn.
ability_html: Deploy: Give Bleeding (4) to an enemy unit. At the end of your turn, give Bleeding (2) to a random enemy unit without Bleeding. Devotion: Bleeding on enemy units also triggers at the end of your turn.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor. Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
flavor: No one, not even among the higher vampires, knows exactly how old the Unseen Elder is. They only know they should never, under any circumstances, defy his will.

name: Cleaver
ability:
Intimidate.
Deploy: Spawn and play Shakedown.
Increase this card's Intimidate by 1 for every adjacent Crownsplitter.
Fee 4: Spawn a Cleaver's Muscle on this row.
ability_html: Intimidate. Deploy: Spawn and play Shakedown. Increase this card's Intimidate by 1 for every adjacent Crownsplitter. Fee 4: Spawn a Cleaver's Muscle on this row.
keyword_html: Intimidate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a Crime card. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
flavor: Me hogs willnae go hungry th' day thanks to ye.

name: Whoreson Junior
ability:
Insanity.
Deploy: Damage a boosted enemy unit by 6. Gain a Coin for every point of excess damage dealt.
Devotion: Damage an enemy unit instead.
Fee 3: Destroy an enemy unit with 3 power or less.
ability_html: Insanity. Deploy: Damage a boosted enemy unit by 6. Gain a Coin for every point of excess damage dealt. Devotion: Damage an enemy unit instead. Fee 3: Destroy an enemy unit with 3 power or less.
keyword_html: Insanity: If you have insufficient Coins, damage this unit by its Fee amount, ignoring its Armor, to trigger its Fee ability.\nNote: Insanity cannot be used if it would destroy the unit and works only if damage is inflicted. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round. Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards. Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
flavor: A war with Whoreson will see Novigrad's gutters run red with blood.

name: Rience
ability:
Deploy: Look at the top 3 units in your deck. Move 1 to your graveyard, then destroy an enemy unit with power equal to that unit's power
Order: Set the power of a unit to match the number of cards in your deck.
ability_html: Deploy: Look at the top 3 units in your deck. Move 1 to your graveyard, then destroy an enemy unit with power equal to that unit's power Order: Set the power of a unit to match the number of cards in your deck.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
flavor: “I, Rience, taught her pain. With these hands, with these fingers. And I promised her that should you fall into my hands, princess, I would also teach you pain. With these hands, with these fingers…” - Rience

name: Dead Man's Tongue
ability:
Banish a card from your deck. If it was a bronze, Banish another bronze card from your deck.
Boost an allied unit by the combined provision cost of Banished cards.
ability_html: Banish a card from your deck. If it was a bronze, Banish another bronze card from your deck. Boost an allied unit by the combined provision cost of Banished cards.
keyword_html: Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
flavor: They say the dead tell no tales. Truth is, they speak no lies.

name: Blightmaker
ability:
Deploy: Move a card in your deck to the top of it. If it was a Mage, Spawn The Guardian in this row.
If it was a special card, Spawn and play a Cow Carcass.
ability_html: Deploy: Move a card in your deck to the top of it. If it was a Mage, Spawn The Guardian in this row. If it was a special card, Spawn and play a Cow Carcass.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
flavor: In an attempt to manufacture a superior grapevine, the empire’s botanists stumbled upon the creation of a malignant alchemical, and thus was sown the seed of a scheme most sinister.

name: Mage Assassin
ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
If moved to the top of your deck during your turn, Summon self to a random allied row and damage a random enemy unit by 2.
ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. If moved to the top of your deck during your turn, Summon self to a random allied row and damage a random enemy unit by 2.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
flavor: Somewhere deep within Nilfgaard’s imperial archives is a manuscript titled “Forty-Seven Ways to Kill a Man”. It’s a surprisingly jovial read.

name: Fulmar
ability:
Deploy: Spawn and play Tears of Siren.
Order: Replace Rain on an enemy row with Storm of the same duration.
ability_html: Deploy: Spawn and play Tears of Siren. Order: Replace Rain on an enemy row with Storm of the same duration.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1. Storm: At the start of the owner's turn, damage all units on this row by 1.
flavor: “Praise the Goddess for all the paths that she opens before you, and turn your greedy gaze away from those She closes in her wisdom” - Fulmar

name: Bride of the Sea
ability: Deploy: Play an Alchemy card from your graveyard with a provision cost 4 or less. Increase the cost by the total duration of Rain and Storm on your opponent's side.
ability_html: Deploy: Play an Alchemy card from your graveyard with a provision cost 4 or less. Increase the cost by the total duration of Rain and Storm on your opponent's side.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1. Storm: At the start of the owner's turn, damage all units on this row by 1.
flavor: Chosen from among the descendants of Rioghan the Undying. A man whose deeds have cast a dark shadow over his kin for decades.

name: Melusine Cultist
ability:
Order: Spawn Rain for 2 turns on an enemy row.
At the end of your turn, if there is Rain on the opposite row, boost the unit to the right by 1. If there is Storm on the opposite row, boost adjacent units by 1 instead.
ability_html: Order: Spawn Rain for 2 turns on an enemy row. At the end of your turn, if there is Rain on the opposite row, boost the unit to the right by 1. If there is Storm on the opposite row, boost adjacent units by 1 instead.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1. Storm: At the start of the owner's turn, damage all units on this row by 1.
flavor: But we can still eat fish, can't we?

name: Tears of Siren
ability: Spawn Rain on an enemy row for 2 turns, then Spawn a Deafening Siren on the opposite row.
ability_html: Spawn Rain on an enemy row for 2 turns, then Spawn a Deafening Siren on the opposite row.
keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1.
flavor: It is said they only cry for love lost. A pity they only love once in a lifetime…

name: Francesca Findabair
ability:
Veil.
Whenever you play a Special card, remove one Counter.
Counter: 2.
When Counter reaches 0, Spawn and play a base copy of the last Special card you played. If it is Neutral, give it Doomed.
ability_html: Veil. Whenever you play a Special card, remove one Counter. Counter: 2. When Counter reaches 0, Spawn and play a base copy of the last Special card you played. If it is Neutral, give it Doomed.
keyword_html: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
flavor: Francesca Findabair's blue elven eyes were as impenetrable and hard as glass. When he was introduced to her, the Daisy of the Valleys smiled. The smile, though incredibly beautiful, filled the witcher with terror.

name: Vanadáin
ability:
Deploy: Move up to 2 cards from your hand to the bottom of your deck. Add Waylay to your hand for each card moved that way.
Whenever you play Waylay, Spawn an Elven Deadeye on this row.
ability_html: Deploy: Move up to 2 cards from your hand to the bottom of your deck. Add Waylay to your hand for each card moved that way. Whenever you play Waylay, Spawn an Elven Deadeye on this row.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
flavor: It’s better to first gag humans, then listen to what they have to say.

name: Sorceress of Dol Blathanna
ability: Order: Create and play a bronze Scoia'tael special card with a provision cost equal to or lower than this card's power.
ability_html: Order: Create and play a bronze Scoia'tael special card with a provision cost equal to or lower than this card's power.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
flavor: Whilst you are mesmerized by the fishes, a different elf moves to cut your throat.

name: Whisperer of Dol Blathanna
ability:
Veil.
When you play a special card, Spawn a base copy of self on this row and remove a Counter.
Counter: 1.
ability_html: Veil. When you play a special card, Spawn a base copy of self on this row and remove a Counter. Counter: 1.
keyword_html: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
flavor: You won't find more fertile land than in the Valley of Flowers, and with a little magic you can count on a ripe harvest up to three times a year.

name: Gerhart of Aelle
ability:
Zeal. Patience.
Order: Create and play a [4] provision Spell.
ability_html: Zeal. Patience. Order: Create and play a [4] provision Spell.
keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Patience: At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, increase the card's specified value by 1 for the rest of the game. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
flavor: Gerhart of Aelle, otherwise known as Hen Gedymdeith, was the oldest living sorcerer. That is, until his death on Thanedd Island during the coup, where his heart, feeble from inconceivable age, simply gave out among the ruckus.

name: Istredd
ability:
Zeal. Patience.
Order: Draw up to [1] card(s), then shuffle the same number of cards back to your deck.
Whenever you draw a unit card, boost it by 1, if it's not a unit, boost self by 1 instead.
ability_html: Zeal. Patience. Order: Draw up to [1] card(s), then shuffle the same number of cards back to your deck. Whenever you draw a unit card, boost it by 1, if it's not a unit, boost self by 1 instead.
keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Patience: At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, increase the card's specified value by 1 for the rest of the game. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
flavor: Love can make one do crazy things. The loss of love, even more so.

name: Casting Contest
ability: Boost an allied unit by 5. If it's bronze, reset its Order ability and give it Zeal.
ability_html: Boost an allied unit by 5. If it's bronze, reset its Order ability and give it Zeal.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
flavor: Tales of Yennefer of Vengerberg have spurred many an inebriated attempt to replicate her fabled foot-casting. It never ends well.

name: Ban Ard Student
ability:
Patience (Melee).
Order (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by [0].
ability_html: Patience (Melee). Order (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by [0].
keyword_html: Patience: At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, increase the card's specified value by 1 for the rest of the game. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
flavor: Kaedweni Intelligence considers Ban Ard a hot spot for recruitment, and expelled students⁠—of which there are many⁠—often find themselves swiftly enlisted within the secret service.

name: She Who Knows
ability: Sabbath: At the end of round, give Resilience to the highest base power unit on your side of the battlefield.
ability_html: Sabbath: At the end of round, give Resilience to the highest base power unit on your side of the battlefield.
keyword_html: Sabbath: Trigger this ability if at least one of your rows has a total of 25 or more points. Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round.
flavor: She knows well what kind of clay her daughters are made of. After all, she kneaded it herself.

name: Rat Catcheress
ability:
Whenever this unit is damaged, reduce its base power by 1.
Sabbath: Cancel the ability above.
Whenever you play a Relict, increase this unit's base power by 1.
ability_html: Whenever this unit is damaged, reduce its base power by 1. Sabbath: Cancel the ability above. Whenever you play a Relict, increase this unit's base power by 1.

flavor: The witch grabbed the bells and started to play a lively melody that attracted small rodents and children alike.

name: Gan Ceann
ability: Deploy: Increase this unit's base power by 2 for each adjacent Relict.
ability_html: Deploy: Increase this unit's base power by 2 for each adjacent Relict.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: A head in the hands is worth two on the neck.

name: Witch Apprentice

keyword_html: Sabbath: Trigger this ability if at least one of your rows has a total of 25 or more points.
flavor: Mistress said I would have to toss it on the spit after I finish my studies, but she was just kidding. Right...?

name: The Witchfinder
ability:
Deploy: Spawn 3 Syndicate Crowns.
At the end of your turn, if no enemy unit has a Bounty, place a Bounty on the highest-power enemy unit.

flavor: Woe to all those who find themselves on the wrong side of Octavia Hale, the self-proclaimed world-renowned finder⁠—and punisher⁠—of witches, warlocks, and were-things.

name: Syndicate Crown
ability:
Doomed. Zeal.
Order: Gain 1 Coin and Banish self.

name: Fabian Hale

Intimidate.

Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
flavor: Fabian takes great pride in his work, with each “victory” etched upon his skin as a permanent reminder of memories most pleasant.

name: Hysteria
ability: Place a Bounty on an enemy unit and damage it by 3. If it already has a Bounty, double the damage.

flavor: Somebody’s poisoned the waterhole! With innards!

name: Vigilantes
ability: Whenever a Bounty is placed on an enemy unit, damage it by 2.
ability_html: Whenever a Bounty is placed on an enemy unit, damage it by 2.
keyword_html: Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time.
flavor: The alderman’s wife worked all night on these here costumes⁠—you should be damned grateful, you swines!

name: Teleportation

Yet, some mages refused to be restrained by the fetters of absolute authority, choosing instead to practice their craft away from prying eyes. Deemed 'enemies of the institution', these renegades were promptly hunted down and punished.

flavor: For the uninitiated, the Grand Scheme will manifest itself as an avalanche: a series of seemingly insignificant events putting the entire mountain slope in motion to sweep away the ancien régime. Only the madmen and the thorough historians, studying the developments of these days in retrospect, many decades later, will discover the truth:  it was a mechanism as precise as a clock, counting down to the advent of a new world order.

flavor: Can ye hold yer breath 'till dis candle burns out? No? Then don't tell me five hundred oren is too much for a pearl.

name: Saskia: Commander
ability:
Immunity.

flavor: We won't be fighting mere minions, but their King! And the King himself will have to recognize our victory! Could a soldier dream of better than defeating a monarch?

flavor: “They say it’s the game of kings. That chess teaches one to think strategically. What a load of rubbish! Both sides have identical pieces, the rules stay invariably the same. How does that mirror real life?”

name: Jan Calveit

flavor: Behind the Hierarch's pious pageant, his luxurious silks and exotic wines, his whores and slaves, beneath all that lust, greed, and vanity, stands an honorable man.

name: Aerondight

flavor: A deceptively light blade, razor-sharp, and perfectly balanced.\n\nThe sword is said to only reveal itself to worthy champions and therefore spends most of its time hidden, patiently awaiting its next bearer.

flavor: Alzur’s opus magnum. Contains the accumulated knowledge of the legendary mage.\n\nMages across the realms knew of the simplicity and elegance of Alzur's repertoire, but the sheer, overwhelming mechanics behind them remained forever guarded.

ability_html: Boost an allied unit by the amount of damage dealt to enemy units this turn, or damage an enemy unit by the amount of boost given to allied units this turn.
flavor: The burner is suited for such tasks as warding off evil spirits, diffusing pleasant aromas, or creating spooky atmospheres for one’s lair.

name: Runemage
ability: Deploy: For the rest of the game, your Create effects show you 5 options instead of 3. Create and play a Runestone.

flavor: To you, perhaps, they are mere rocks, but to me they are the cornerstones to building a new world. In each etch I see a city; in each resonance I hear the anthems of a generation!

name: Obsidian Mirror
ability: Spawn 1-power copies of 3 enemy bronze units on their opposite row.
ability_html: Spawn 1-power copies of 3 enemy bronze units on their opposite row.
keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
flavor: Beware to those who would gaze too long into its obsidian sheen, for one knows not what might gaze back.

name: Prophet
ability:

flavor: In his vision, he saw a mage beckon to a black sky as it split open. From the breach, he saw an enormous monstrosity with hooked limbs descending upon a city, smashing and crushing it to rubble. He saw destruction, death, and chaos incarnate, and he was paralysed with fear.

name: Magic Compass
ability:
Echo.
Look at the top 3 cards in your deck. Play one, then move the others to your graveyard.
If there is less than 3 cards in your deck, Spawn and play a Legendary Skellige card that was not in your starting deck instead.

name: Highland Warlord

Veteran.

name: Prism Pendant
ability:
Whenever you target an allied unit with a special, give it Vitality equal to the special's provision cost.
Whenever you target an enemy unit with a special, give it Bleeding equal to the special's provision cost.

Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
flavor: Its light, glassy design—inspired by a simple wonder of nature—makes channeling magical energy as easy as breathing.

name: Giantslayer
ability:

Barricade: Trigger this ability if the unit has armor. Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit. Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round.
flavor: Aye, they call me the Giantslayer, and nay, it ain't from bein' a humongous bastard now, is it, ye cocknosed shite!

name: Mutagenerator
ability:
Whenever you play a unit on your Melee row, boost 5 random units on your side of battlefield with the same provision cost by 1.
Whenever you play a unit on your Ranged row, boost 5 random units in your deck with the same provision cost by 1.

flavor: An alchemy device capable of storing the essence of slain creatures. Transmutes the energy into mutagens.\n\nPrimitive in its current form, the apparatus usually produces haphazard results, making experimentation exceedingly difficult to replicate.

name: Traveling Priestess
ability:
Veil.
Deploy: Gain 1 Charges. Whenever this unit is put back into your deck, increase the number of Charges by 2.
Order: Boost an allied unit by 1.
Whenever this unit is Inspired, gain Zeal.
Charge: 0

Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
flavor: Many devotees of the goddess Melitele branch out from the central sanctuary in Ellander to roam the Northern Realms. Most head out as midwives or healers. Others preach messages of peace and love. The rare few choose an itinerant lifestyle, living off of wild berries, and helping out folks along their travels who are struck by misfortune. The presence of such pilgrims is a sign for the forlorn that Melitele has not forsaken them.

name: Necromancer's Tome
ability: Whenever you play a bronze unit, Summon a random copy of it from your graveyard to the same row and give it Doomed.

flavor: Some of the pages are made of human flesh, and the various prophecies, burial rites, and resurrection passages found enclosed are inked in blood.

name: Giant Toad
ability:
Deploy: Consume an allied unit.
When you play a Deathwish unit on your Ranged row, Summon self from your graveyard to the same row, Consume it and gain Doomed.

Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
flavor: Don't expect to end up like Sleeping Beauty once the Toad kisses you. Oh, no. You will swell rapidly into what can only be described as a pustulous, varicose grape, and this is before your pores begin to rupture and discharge the coalescent gravy that is your four humors.

name: Conjurer's Candle
ability:
Resilience.

Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
flavor: The ornament’s aesthetic is particularly pleasing to those with a fondness for the macabre, yet its true allure lies with its mystical properties; for any old candle can light up a dark space, but only a few can illuminate the truth.

flavor: For what seems like centuries, the most brilliant minds in the world⁠—from theorists to fanatics⁠—have frequently gathered to speculate and debate the purpose of the Golden Nekker. Although they have not yet agreed upon the nature and origin of the strange, elusive statuette, they vow to have an answer “soon”.

name: Ard Feainn
ability:
Resilience.

If it was an Agent, give an enemy unit Spying. If it was an Aristocrat, give an enemy unit Bleeding (2).

While in deck, when you play a gold Aristocrat, summon self to your Melee row.
ability_html: Resilience. Order: Look at the top 2 cards from your deck, and choose one to move to the bottom. If it was an Agent, give an enemy unit Spying. keyword_html: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
flavor: The Great Sun does not extend its light to those destined for the gutters.
